channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Inside the mind of Elad Gil: Early-stage investing and next-gen innovation at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025

item.title: Save $36 on a Cool, Compact Hall Effect Keyboard
item.description: The Keychron Q1 HE brings our favorite new type of keyboard switch to the mainstream.

item.title: $3,800 Flights and Aborted Takeoffs: How Trump’s H-1B Announcement Panicked Tech Workers
item.description: President Trump’s sudden policy shift sent tech firms scrambling to get immigrant workers back to the US and avoid $100,000 fees.

item.title: The Oakland Ballers let an AI manage the team. What could go wrong?
item.description: “Baseball is the perfect place to do an initial experiment like this, because it is so data-driven, and decisions are made very analytically," Ballers...

item.title: Facebook is getting an AI dating assistant
item.description: Facebook Dating's AI assistant is supposed to help users build their profiles and find the matches they're looking for.

item.title: WIRED Roundup: The Right Embraces Cancel Culture

item.title: Should You Subscribe to Garmin Connect+? (2025)
item.description: Every fitness company has jumped on the AI-powered fitness subscription bandwagon. Should you?

item.title: The Best Cat Litter Depends on Your Cat and Type of Litter Box
item.description: Between clay, tofu, crystal, and more, here's how to determine the best type of cat litter for your home (and cat).

item.title: Stellantis cancels plans for an electrified Jeep Gladiator
item.description: The move comes a week after the automaker axed plans to produce an all-electric Ram pickup truck.
